# [Interview #134: Rotterdam Signing Report - Aan'allein, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=134#16)

#### Kurafire

Are the ruins of Lews Therin's palace still in the current world?

#### Robert Jordan

Ah, no.

#### Kurafire

They are really gone?

#### Robert Jordan

They are really gone.
